Description:
Detects a suspicious output redirection to the local admins share, this technique is often found in malicious scripts or hacktool stagers

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Redirection to Local Admin Share
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%>%' and (command like '%\\\\127.0.0.1\\admin$\\%' or command like '%\\\\localhost\\admin$\\%'))
